name: Black Ink (itch)
description:
Black Ink"Ehh... Class is boring right? Let's draw a little."

Black Ink is a puzzle-platformer where you have to reach the goal with the help of your... drawing skills.

I developed this short, little game for the 'One game a week' challange but overshot a bit. This is the second game I've made so far so don't be too harsh.

Maybe I'll come back to this later. There are plenty of possibilities like

- local Multiplayer

- themed worlds and a ton of new levels

- new mechanics


Thanks for playing.
